languages.text: "Нет. Я был бы против. Я бы нашел способ не впутывать Глейто в происходящее".
"No. I would have opposed it. I would have found a way to keep Glaito out of it."

languages.text: "Nein. Ich hätte mich dagegen verwehrt. Ich hätte einen Weg gefunden, Glaito herauszuhalten."
languages.original_text: "No. I would have opposed it. I would have found a way to keep Glaito out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich hätte mich dagegen verwehrt. Ich hätte einen Weg gefunden, Glaito herauszuhalten."

languages.text: « Non. Je m'y serais opposé. J'aurais trouvé un moyen de protéger Glaito de toute cette affaire. »

languages.text: “不知道。如果我早知道的话，我肯定会反对，我绝不会让格雷托卷入这样的事情。”

languages.text: "Hayır. Bilsem müsaade etmezdim. Ne yapar eder, Glatio'yu kullanmalarına izin vermezdim."
languages.original_text: "No. I would have opposed it. I would have found a way to keep Glaito out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Yok, bilsem müsaade eder miyim? Ne yapar eder, Glatio'yu kullanmalarına izin vermezdim."
